short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a cognitive bias and description when you open a new tab. Refreshes daily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remind yourself of cognitive biases and learn about new ones to help you navigate everyday communication and economics.

Great for researchers, marketers, entrepreneurs, and anyone who does critical thinking to identify biases of others and their own.
